snippet: T. J. Wilcox is creating a panoramic film chronicling one day in Manhattan for a forthcoming show at the Whitney Museum of American Art.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; TJ Wilcox is creating panoramic film chronicling single day in Manhattan for Whitney Museum of Art show; London auction experts at Sotheby's, Christie's and Phillips are preparing for big June sales; Connie Butler, Museum of Modern Art's former chief curator of drawings, is named chief curator of Hammer Museum in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: T. J. Wilcox is creating a panoramic film chronicling one day in Manhattan for a forthcoming show at the Whitney Museum of American Art.

headline.seo: T. J. Wilcox Panoramic Film to Show at Whitney
headline.main: A Historic Immersion Before Whitney Moves
